question: Match the following select the correct option for the quantity of electricity, in <katex>$\text{C mol}^{-1}$</katex> required to deposit various metals at cathode.

| List-I | List-II |
|---|---|
| a. <katex>$\text{Ag}^+$</katex> | i. 386000 |
| b. <katex>$\text{Mg}^{2+}$</katex> | ii. 289500 |
| c. <katex>$\text{Al}^{3+}$</katex> | iii. 96500 |
| d. <katex>$\text{Ti}^{4+}$</katex> | iv. 193000 |
